head.title: Nordonia Hills City School District News Article

input.name: __VIEWSTATE

div.style: position: absolute; width: 100%; height: 100%; left: 0px; background: #FFFFFF;

span.style: font-size: calc(16em / 15);font-weight:300;color:White;font-family: synthese;
color:White;font-size: calc(16em / 15);

div.h3: Inspiring Every Student to Value Learning, Community and Excellence

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Thank you for your continued support and flexibility as we work through these unprecedented times. All Ohio schools will be closed at least through May 1

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 700; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap
font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: to help prevent the community spread of COVID-19.

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; color: #222222; background-color: #ffffff; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: A few things today, and then you should not expect daily emails or calls from me during spring break unless major news happens.

li.style: list-style-type: disc; font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre

span.style: font-size: 12pt; color: #222222; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: First, do your best to enjoy your Spring Break. I am sure many of you had to cancel plans, and I am sure there's not much you can do other than hang around the house and go to the park. But take some time to relax and unplug.

li.style: list-style-type: disc; font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; color: #222222; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre

span.style: font-size: 12pt; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: We will continue to provide meals during Spring Break on Mondays and Thursdays.

span.style: font-size: 12pt; color: #333333; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap
font-size: 12pt; color: #337ab7; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap
font-size: 12pt; color: #333333; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

li.style: list-style-type: disc; font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; color: #333333; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre

span.style: font-size: 12pt; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: We will be passing out free Easter egg packs along with school meals on Thursday, April 9. The eggs were filled with candy back in February, and have been donated to the schools by Western Reserve Grace Church. These eggs can be used to create your own Easter egg hunt at home and hopefully provide a fun activity for your family.

li.style: list-style-type: disc; font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; color: #333333; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre

span.style: font-size: 12pt; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: If you are not part of the free meal program and would still like to receive a free egg pack, you can have one delivered using non-contact precautions to your doorstep by signing up here

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-weight: 700; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap
font-size: 12pt; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap
font-size: 12pt; color: #337ab7; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap
font-size: 12pt; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

li.style: list-style-type: disc; font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; color: #222222; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-weight: 700; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap
font-size: 12pt; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: is a professional development day. Teachers will be working together to ensure things are ready to go for April 15.

li.style: list-style-type: disc; font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre

span.style: font-size: 12pt; color: #222222; font-weight: 700; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap
font-size: 12pt; color: #222222; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: we return live with online learning. A large group of teachers and administrators have worked to put together the attached guidelines and expectations for students. Principals will follow up with more specific details for your building.

li.style: list-style-type: disc; font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; color: #222222; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre

span.style: font-size: 12pt; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: During the online learning period, this is our guiding philosophy: More important than making sure our kids don't miss any curriculum is simply making sure our kids are OK. Families, you should feel no pressure or stress that you have to get all of the content covered. We will get to the content in good time. Instead, keep doing what you can to make sure your kids are safe and unafraid. We will do our best to see that parents who may be facing illness or job loss or wage cuts don't feel overwhelmed by any expectations we are imposing on them.

li.style: list-style-type: disc; font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre

span.style: font-size: 12pt; color: #222222; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: So, please click the link to see the guidelines and expectations and be prepared for them to be active starting April 15. Nordonia Online Learning Student and Family Expectations and Guidelines

span.style: font-size: 12pt; color: #222222; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

li.span: Until then, take care of yourselves and enjoy your break.

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: These are unprecedented times, and we will get through them together through flexibility and common sense. Please understand this closure is not only to keep students and staff safe, but also to prevent the spread of COVID-19 as seen in other countries around the world.

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: As always, thanks for your continued support of the Nordonia Schools, and Go Knights!

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap
font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

span.br:
9370 Olde Eight Rd. Northfield, OH 44067
Phone: 330.467.0580 | Fax: 330.468.0152

div.h3: Inspiring Every Student to Value Learning, Community and Excellence
